divs: sighting detailsi saw a red\orange glowing object - unlike i've ever seen before. it definitely did not look like a place or helicopter. those always fly over my apartment and i am fairly familiar what they look like in the dark sky. this object was over the lake, and i could see it from lollapalooza around 9:40 pm and 10:00 pm. i had a friend look at it, and she agreed she had never seen anything like it before. i watched it for about 10 mins and then it disappeared quickly into the distance. i had taken a picture of it in my phone (sorry cannot upload pic). although i only saw one object, my phone shows 3 other dimmer objects in the distance around the orange orb. the dimmer object are of yellowish\green.
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around August 4th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
